Plot: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.
Title: Unaccompanied Minors
Actors: Lewis Black, Wilmer Valderrama, Tyler James Williams, Dyllan Christopher
tomatoConsensus: Unaccompanied Minors, while featuring credible performances by its mostly young cast, is simply a rehash of other, funnier movies.
